text: Every time we go to 🇮🇳, we take #chloroquine tablets to prevent malaria. Given #asymptomatic spread, would it make sense for everyone to take one 500mg tablet/month prophylactically for a few months? What are side effects? @curiouswavefn @Dereklowe @MichaelPellini #coronavirus https://t.co/OAu6bDCdsS
